sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个工程需要两年完成。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège gōngchéng xūyào liǎng nián wánchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce projet nécessite deux ans pour être achevé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This project takes two years to complete.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gèbié xuésheng méiyǒu lái shàngkè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelques étudiants ne sont pas venus en cours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A few students did not come to class.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì gètǐ jīngyíngzhě.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est travailleur indépendant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a self-employed businessman.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 根据天气预报，明天会下雨。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gēnjù tiānqì yùbào, míngtiān huì xià yǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Selon les prévisions météo, il pleuvra demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: According to the weather forecast, it will rain tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī cì chángtú lǚxíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un long voyage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a long-distance trip.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bùyào yídòng zhège xiāngzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez ne pas déplacer cette boîte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please do not move this box.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng gòumǎi yī tái diànnǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais acheter un ordinateur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to purchase a computer.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā hǎoxiàng shēngbìng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: On dirait qu'il est malade.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It seems like he is sick.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gèdì de fēngsú bùtóng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les coutumes varient d'un endroit à l'autre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Customs vary from place to place.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi zhèngfǔ guānyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un fonctionnaire du gouvernement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a government official.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们明天早上八点出发。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen míngtiān zǎoshang bā diǎn chūfā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous partons demain matin à huit heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We will set off at eight o'clock tomorrow morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōumò wǒmen qù gòuwù ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons faire du shopping ce week-end.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go shopping this weekend.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàtiān chī xīguā hěn liángshuǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Manger de la pastèque en été est très rafraîchissant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Eating watermelon in summer is very refreshing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǒu yī fèn gùdìng de gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a un emploi stable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a stable job.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gǒu xǐhuan kěn gǔtou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les chiens aiment ronger des os.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Dogs like to chew on bones.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 关于这个问题，我有一些看法。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Guānyú zhège wèntí, wǒ yǒu yīxiē kànfǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Concernant ce problème, j'ai quelques avis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Regarding this issue, I have some opinions.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhāng guāngpán lǐ yǒu shénme?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Qu'y a-t-il sur ce CD ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is on this CD?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huānyíng guānglín!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bienvenue !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Welcome!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì guānfāng fābù de xiāoxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une information publiée officiellement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an official announcement.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 大约有五十人参加了会议。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàyuē yǒu wǔshí rén cānjiā le huìyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Environ cinquante personnes ont participé à la réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: About fifty people attended the meeting.
